segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Hi Emma, great to connect again. Last time we talked about your team's challenges with pipeline visibility. Ready to dive into the demo?

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Yes, definitely! I brought our VP of Sales, David, to join as well. He's the ultimate decision maker on this.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Perfect, welcome David. Let me show you how our dashboard gives you real-time visibility into your entire pipeline.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Quick question before we start - we've looked at three other tools this month. What makes you different from Gong or Chorus?

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Great question. While those are solid tools, our key differentiator is the predictive analytics. We don't just show you what happened - we forecast what's likely to happen based on conversation patterns.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: That's interesting. Our biggest headache is deals that go dark. Reps mark them as 'likely to close' and then nothing happens for months.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: We have an early warning system for exactly that. It flags deals where engagement drops or when negative signals appear in conversations.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Now that's something I could use. How accurate are these predictions?

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Our customers typically see 85% accuracy after the system learns from about 3 months of data.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: 85% is solid. We're currently at maybe 50% accuracy on our forecasts. The board is constantly on my case about it.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Can it also track competitor mentions? We often lose deals to CloudRival and finding out earlier would help us counter their pitch.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Absolutely. You can set up custom trackers for any competitor or topic. It'll alert you in real-time when they come up.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: You should build a feature that automatically suggests battle cards when competitors are mentioned. That would be incredibly useful.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: That's actually in our Q2 roadmap! Great minds think alike.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: I have to say, I've been looking at your website and the case studies are really compelling. The ROI numbers from the Fintech company were exactly what I needed to build my business case.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: The demo is impressive. One concern though - our IT team is stretched thin. How much effort is onboarding really?

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Very minimal. It's a cloud solution with SSO support. Most IT teams tell us it's one of the easiest deployments they've done.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: That's a relief. Our last software implementation took 6 months and was a nightmare.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Speaking of nightmares, does this work with Zoom? We're 100% remote and Zoom is our lifeline.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Native Zoom integration, yes. Also works with Teams, Google Meet, and most VoIP systems.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Perfect. What about mobile? Our reps are often on the road and need to access things from their phones.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: We have iOS and Android apps. The mobile experience is actually something we've invested heavily in.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Look, I'm going to be honest with you. We need to move fast on this. If we can get a deal done this quarter, I have budget to use. Otherwise we'll have to wait until next fiscal year.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: One last thing - I noticed your pricing calculator on the website was broken when I tried it yesterday. Just FYI.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Overall, this is probably the best demo we've seen. The predictive stuff alone is worth the investment if it's as accurate as you say.
